snippet: The second day in the trial of two high school football stars accused of raping a drunk 16-year-old girl was dominated by text messages unveiled by the prosecution.
abstract: Second day in Steubenville, Ohio, trial of Trent Mays and Ma'lik Richmond, high school football stars accused of raping a drunk 16-year-old girl, is dominated by text messages unveiled by the prosecution.
lead_paragraph: The second day in the trial of two high school football stars accused of raping a drunk 16-year-old girl was dominated by text messages unveiled by the prosecution.

headline.seo: Steubenville Rape Case Hinges on Girl’s Impairment
headline.main: Text Messages at Center of Rape Trial Testimony
headline.print_headline: Text Messages at Center Of Rape Trial Testimony
